name: swift-pictures
description: Image storage service with openstack swift
author: wuxueqian <wuxueqian2010@hotmail.com>

scripts.start:dl: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --debug --watch Server --watch Swift -e ts --exec "npm run tsnode" Server/download/index.ts 9229
scripts.start:up: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --debug --watch Server --watch Swift -e ts --exec "npm run tsnode" Server/upload/index.ts 9229
